title: Create Initial Database Models for Scripts and Versions
description: Define the EF Core entities for `TransformationScript` and `TransformationScriptVersion`. Set up relationships and generate the initial EF Core migration for script and version storage.
sprint_goal: Establish the core backend engine, database schema, and security foundations.
acceptance_criteria: `TransformationScript` and `TransformationScriptVersion` C# classes are created; An EF Core migration script is successfully generated.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; Unit tests passing; Migration script generated and tested.
testing_requirements: Unit testing of EF Core configuration.
deployment_notes: Migration must be applied to staging DB.
business_value: Provides the foundational database schema for storing all transformation scripts and their version history.

title: Implement Repositories for Script Management
description: Create the data access layer (repositories) to handle CRUD operations for `TransformationScript` and `TransformationScriptVersion` entities, abstracting the EF Core logic.
sprint_goal: Establish the core backend engine, database schema, and security foundations.
acceptance_criteria: Repository provides transactional methods for creating/updating scripts and versions; All data access for scripts goes through this repository.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; Integration tests passing against a test database.
business_value: Creates a stable, testable data access layer for all script and version management operations.

title: Design and Implement IAuditLogger Service
description: Create a service to handle the creation of audit log entries for security-sensitive events. The implementation will write structured log entries to a dedicated 'AuditLog' database table.
sprint_goal: Establish the core backend engine, database schema, and security foundations.
acceptance_criteria: An `IAuditLogger` interface is defined; Implementation writes to a new 'AuditLog' table; The logged event includes user ID, action, timestamp, and entity IDs.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; Integration tests for the logger are passing; A new EF Core migration for the AuditLog table is generated.
testing_requirements: Integration testing to confirm log persistence.
deployment_notes: Migration for AuditLog table must be applied to staging DB.
business_value: Provides the foundational service for all security and compliance logging, essential for meeting SOC 2/ISO 27001 objectives.

title: Design and Implement ITransformationEngine Service with Jint
description: Create the `ITransformationEngine` interface and a `JintTransformationEngine` implementation. This service will encapsulate the Jint engine, accept a script and a `System.Text.Json.JsonNode`, and return a `JsonNode`.
sprint_goal: Establish the core backend engine, database schema, and security foundations.
acceptance_criteria: The service can be injected via DI; A method `Execute(string script, JsonNode data)` is defined; The service correctly passes a JSON object to a script and retrieves the modified result.
business_value: Creates the central service for executing all JavaScript transformations.

title: Implement Jint Sandbox Security Constraints
description: Configure each Jint engine instance with strict, configurable security constraints for execution timeout, memory allocation, statement count, and disable CLR access.
sprint_goal: Establish the core backend engine, database schema, and security foundations.
acceptance_criteria: CLR access is disabled; Scripts violating timeout, memory, or statement limits are terminated with specific exceptions; All constraint values are loaded from `appsettings.json`.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed by security lead; Unit tests for each constraint violation are passing.
testing_requirements: Unit testing that triggers each constraint.
deployment_notes: Configuration values must be set in production appsettings.
business_value: Critical security feature to prevent denial-of-service or code execution attacks via user scripts.

title: Implement Exception Handling and Error DTO Mapping
description: Wrap Jint execution calls in try-catch blocks. Catch `Jint.Runtime.JavaScriptException` and `Esprima.ParserException`, extract relevant details (message, line number, stack), and map them to a `ScriptErrorDto`.
sprint_goal: Establish the core backend engine, database schema, and security foundations.
acceptance_criteria: A script runtime error is caught and does not crash the service; A script syntax error is caught; The returned DTO contains the correct `message`, `stackTrace`, and `lineNumber`.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; Unit tests for syntax and runtime error handling are passing.
business_value: Improves developer experience by providing structured, actionable error messages for script debugging.

title: Implement Backend API for Script CRUD
description: Create the `TransformationsController` with actions for GET (list), GET (by ID), POST, PUT, and DELETE to manage `TransformationScript` and `TransformationScriptVersion` entities.
sprint_goal: Expose core script management via APIs and build the foundational UI editor.
acceptance_criteria: All endpoints are functional; POST creates a script with its first version; PUT creates a new version; DELETE removes a script; Endpoints are secured with RBAC.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; Integration tests for all CRUD endpoints are passing.
business_value: Provides the API layer needed for the UI to manage the lifecycle of transformation scripts.

title: Integrate Audit Logging into Script Management Services
description: Call the `IAuditLogger` service from the business logic layer after every successful Create, Update, and Delete operation for transformation scripts.
sprint_goal: Expose core script management via APIs and build the foundational UI editor.
acceptance_criteria: Creating, updating, or deleting a script triggers a corresponding audit log event with correct details.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; Integration tests verifying audit events are created for each CUD operation.
business_value: Ensures all changes to transformation logic are logged for compliance and security monitoring.

title: Implement IEncryptionService using .NET Data Protection APIs
description: Create a service to encrypt and decrypt string data, which will be used by the data access layer to protect sensitive script content before persisting to the database.
sprint_goal: Deliver end-to-end script CRUD and preview functionality, including securing script storage.
acceptance_criteria: Service can encrypt plaintext to ciphertext and decrypt ciphertext back to plaintext; Service is registered for DI.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; Unit tests passing; Key management strategy for production documented.
testing_requirements: Unit testing of encryption and decryption.
deployment_notes: Requires correct DPAPI key configuration in the production environment.
business_value: Provides the core service for encrypting sensitive data at rest, a key security requirement.

title: Integrate Encryption Service into Script Repository
description: Modify the `ScriptRepository` to use the `IEncryptionService` to automatically encrypt script content on write operations and decrypt it on read operations.
sprint_goal: Deliver end-to-end script CRUD and preview functionality, including securing script storage.
acceptance_criteria: Script content is encrypted before saving; Script content is decrypted after retrieval; Process is transparent to calling services.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; Integration tests confirm data is encrypted in the test database and decrypted correctly by the application.
business_value: Implements the encryption-at-rest requirement for sensitive script content.

title: Update Repo to support Versioning
description: Enhance the `ScriptRepository` to support versioning operations, such as getting all versions of a script and creating a new version from an old one (for the revert feature).
sprint_goal: Deliver advanced script versioning and operational monitoring capabilities.
acceptance_criteria: A method exists to retrieve all version metadata for a script; A method exists to create a new version from an old one.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; Integration tests for new repository methods are passing.
business_value: Provides the data access methods required to implement the script versioning feature.

title: Implement Backend API for Script Versioning
description: Create API endpoints to get the version history for a script (`GET /versions`), get the content of a specific version, and revert to a previous version (`POST /versions/{id}/revert`).
sprint_goal: Deliver advanced script versioning and operational monitoring capabilities.
acceptance_criteria: Version history endpoint returns correct metadata; Revert endpoint creates a new version by copying an old one; Endpoints are secured.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; Integration tests for all versioning endpoints are passing.
business_value: Exposes the version history and rollback capabilities via a secure API for the UI to consume.

title: Integrate Audit Logging for Sandbox Violations
description: In the `JintTransformationEngine`, add logic to the `catch` blocks for sandbox violation exceptions (`MemoryLimitExceededException`, etc.) to call the `IAuditLogger` service.
sprint_goal: Deliver advanced script versioning and operational monitoring capabilities.
acceptance_criteria: Timeout, Memory Limit, and Statement Count exceptions each trigger a specific, correctly detailed audit log event.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; Unit tests mocking Jint exceptions verify that the audit logger service is called correctly.
business_value: Provides security administrators with visibility into attempted resource abuse or malicious script activity.

title: Design Audit Trail Storage for Immutability and Compliance
description: Research and design the storage solution for the audit trail. The design must address immutability, integrity, and retention requirements for SOC 2/ISO 27001.
sprint_goal: Deliver advanced script versioning and operational monitoring capabilities.
acceptance_criteria: A design document is produced and reviewed by a compliance expert; It details the storage technology, integrity verification mechanism, and retention policy.
business_value: Defines the technical approach to meet critical enterprise compliance requirements, a major market differentiator.

title: Implement Compliant Audit Trail Storage and Retention
description: Implement the storage mechanism and data retention policy for the audit trail as defined in the approved design document.
sprint_goal: Implement high-risk legacy data migration and finalize compliance features.
acceptance_criteria: The `AuditLogger` service writes to the new compliant backend; Application permissions prevent modification/deletion of logs; A 365-day retention policy is implemented.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; Integration tests and security review passed.
deployment_notes: May require changes to database permissions or infrastructure.
business_value: Implements the technical solution for meeting SOC 2/ISO 27001 audit log requirements.

title: Document and test log integrity verification process
description: Create documentation for operators on how to verify the integrity of the audit log, and create an automated test to check this process.
sprint_goal: Implement high-risk legacy data migration and finalize compliance features.
acceptance_criteria: A markdown document explains the verification procedure; An automated test that simulates tampering and verifies that the integrity check fails.
definition_of_done: Documentation reviewed; Automated test passing in CI.
business_value: Provides the procedural and automated validation necessary to prove compliance to auditors.

title: Analyze Legacy Data and Create Mapping Document
description: Analyze the schema and content of the legacy transformation system. Create a document that maps legacy data fields and structures to the new system's script entities.
sprint_goal: Implement high-risk legacy data migration and finalize compliance features.
acceptance_criteria: A mapping document is created and peer-reviewed; It covers all legacy fields and identifies data quality issues.
business_value: Forms the blueprint for the migration script, ensuring a well-planned and accurate data transition.

title: Develop Idempotent Migration Script
description: Create a .NET Console Application that reads legacy data, transforms it according to the mapping document, and writes it to the new system's database. The script must be idempotent.
sprint_goal: Implement high-risk legacy data migration and finalize compliance features.
acceptance_criteria: Script connects to both data sources, transforms and inserts data correctly, preserves report associations, and does not create duplicates on re-run.
definition_of_done: Code reviewed; Integration tests passing; Staging environment dry-run successful.
testing_requirements: Integration testing against a staging database.
deployment_notes: To be run during a scheduled maintenance window.
business_value: The primary tool for migrating existing customers, ensuring data continuity and a smooth upgrade path.

title: Create Migration and Rollback Documentation
description: Write a step-by-step procedure for executing the migration script, validating its output, and rolling back the entire cutover if validation fails.
sprint_goal: Implement high-risk legacy data migration and finalize compliance features.
acceptance_criteria: A markdown document is created with prerequisites, exact commands, go/no-go criteria, and a step-by-step rollback plan.
definition_of_done: Documentation peer-reviewed and successfully followed during a dry-run in staging.
deployment_notes: This document is critical for the production cutover.
business_value: Provides the runbook necessary for a safe and successful production migration, minimizing risk and downtime.
